summary: Website with a Bond page that lists bond/investment products and their key terms.

existing_features.title:
On the Bonds page (route "/bonds"), add a new section below the existing bond catalog content that lists the following offerings exactly as provided, using English text (no emojis):

1) GoldSecure Capital Protection
- "10.75% p.a. | 1 Year | Annual | Low Risk"

2) GoldShield Regular Income
- "12.50% p.a. | Monthly | 2 Years"

3) GoldGrowth Wealth Builder
- "14.25% p.a. | Compounding | 3 Years"

4) GoldPlus Long Term Wealth
- "15.75% p.a. | Compounding | 5 Years"

5) GoldPlatinum WealthSecure (Premium)
- "17.50% p.a. | Compounding | HNI | â‚¹5L+"

new_feature_requests.summary: Add a product list section below the Bond page content, including GoldSecure, GoldShield, GoldGrowth, GoldPlus, and GoldPlatinum offerings with their rates/tenor/payout/risk details.

projectName: Add Gold product list section below Bonds page
